verses.verse: Say <S%H559><s%> ye unto your brethren <S%H251><s%>, Ammi <S%H5971><s%>; and to your sisters <S%H269><s%>, Ruhamah <S%H7355><s%>. Ammi: that is, My people Ruhamah: that is, Having obtained mercy

Plead <S%H7378><s%> with your mother <S%H517><s%>, plead <S%H7378><s%>: for she is not my wife <S%H802><s%>, neither am I her husband <S%H376><s%>: let her therefore put away <S%H5493><s%> her whoredoms <S%H2183><s%> out of her sight <S%H6440><s%>, and her adulteries <S%H5005><s%> from between her breasts <S%H7699><s%>;

Lest I strip <S%H6584><s%> her naked <S%H6174><s%>, and set <S%H3322><s%> her as in the day <S%H3117><s%> that she was born <S%H3205><s%>, and make <S%H7760><s%> her as a wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and set <S%H7896><s%> her like a dry <S%H6723><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, and slay <S%H4191><s%> her with thirst <S%H6772><s%>.
And I will not have mercy <S%H7355><s%> upon her children <S%H1121><s%>; for they be the children <S%H1121><s%> of whoredoms <S%H2183><s%>.

For their mother <S%H517><s%> hath played the harlot <S%H2181><s%>: she that conceived <S%H2029><s%> them hath done shamefully <S%H3001><s%>: for she said <S%H559><s%>, I will go <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> my lovers <S%H157><s%>, that give <S%H5414><s%> me my bread <S%H3899><s%> and my water <S%H4325><s%>, my wool <S%H6785><s%> and my flax <S%H6593><s%>, mine oil <S%H8081><s%> and my drink <S%H8250><s%>. drink: Heb. drinks

Therefore, behold, I will hedge <S%H7753><s%> up thy way <S%H1870><s%> with thorns <S%H5518><s%>, and make <S%H1443><s%> a wall <S%H1447><s%>, that she shall not find <S%H4672><s%> her paths <S%H5410><s%>. make: Heb. wall a wall

And she shall follow <S%H7291><s%> after her lovers <S%H157><s%>, but she shall not overtake <S%H5381><s%> them; and she shall seek <S%H1245><s%> them, but shall not find <S%H4672><s%> them: then shall she say <S%H559><s%>, I will go <S%H3212><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> to my first <S%H7223><s%> husband <S%H376><s%>; for then was it better <S%H2896><s%> with me than now <S%H6258><s%>.

For she did not know <S%H3045><s%> that I gave <S%H5414><s%> her corn <S%H1715><s%>, and wine <S%H8492><s%>, and oil <S%H3323><s%>, and multiplied <S%H7235><s%> her silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>, which they prepared <S%H6213><s%> for Baal <S%H1168><s%>. wine: Heb. new wine which: or, wherewith they made Baal

Therefore will I return <S%H7725><s%>, and take away <S%H3947><s%> my corn <S%H1715><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> thereof, and my wine <S%H8492><s%> in the season <S%H4150><s%> thereof, and will recover <S%H5337><s%> my wool <S%H6785><s%> and my flax <S%H6593><s%> given to cover <S%H3680><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>. recover: or, take away

And now will I discover <S%H1540><s%> her lewdness <S%H5040><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of her lovers <S%H157><s%>, and none <S%H376><s%> shall deliver <S%H5337><s%> her out of mine hand <S%H3027><s%>. lewdness: Heb. folly, or, villany

I will also cause all her mirth <S%H4885><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%>, her feast days <S%H2282><s%>, her new moons <S%H2320><s%>, and her sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, and all her solemn feasts <S%H4150><s%>.

And I will destroy <S%H8074><s%> her vines <S%H1612><s%> and her fig trees <S%H8384><s%>, whereof she hath said <S%H559><s%>, These are my rewards <S%H866><s%> that my lovers <S%H157><s%> have given <S%H5414><s%> me: and I will make <S%H7760><s%> them a forest <S%H3293><s%>, and the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> them. destroy: Heb. make desolate

And I will visit <S%H6485><s%> upon her the days <S%H3117><s%> of Baalim <S%H1168><s%>, wherein she burned incense <S%H6999><s%> to them, and she decked <S%H5710><s%> herself with her earrings <S%H5141><s%> and her jewels <S%H2484><s%>, and she went <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> her lovers <S%H157><s%>, and forgat <S%H7911><s%> me, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Therefore, behold, I will allure <S%H6601><s%> her, and bring <S%H3212><s%> her into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> comfortably <S%H3820><s%> unto her. comfortably: or, friendly: Heb. to her heart

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> her her vineyards <S%H3754><s%> from thence, and the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Achor <S%H5911><s%> for a door <S%H6607><s%> of hope <S%H8615><s%>: and she shall sing <S%H6030><s%> there, as in the days <S%H3117><s%> of her youth <S%H5271><s%>, and as in the day <S%H3117><s%> when she came up <S%H5927><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And it shall be at that day <S%H3117><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, that thou shalt call <S%H7121><s%> me Ishi <S%H376><s%>; and shalt call <S%H7121><s%> me no more Baali <S%H1180><s%>. Ishi: that is, My husband Baali: that is, My lord
For I will take away <S%H5493><s%> the names <S%H8034><s%> of Baalim <S%H1168><s%> out of her mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and they shall no more be remembered <S%H2142><s%> by their name <S%H8034><s%>.

And in that day <S%H3117><s%> will I make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> for them with the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, and with the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and with the creeping things <S%H7431><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%>: and I will break <S%H7665><s%> the bow <S%H7198><s%> and the sword <S%H2719><s%> and the battle <S%H4421><s%> out of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and will make them to lie down <S%H7901><s%> safely <S%H983><s%>.

And I will betroth <S%H781><s%> thee unto me for ever <S%H5769><s%>; yea, I will betroth <S%H781><s%> thee unto me in righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and in judgment <S%H4941><s%>, and in lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>, and in mercies <S%H7356><s%>.
I will even betroth <S%H781><s%> thee unto me in faithfulness <S%H530><s%>: and thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that day <S%H3117><s%>, I will hear <S%H6030><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, I will hear <S%H6030><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and they shall hear <S%H6030><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>;
And the earth <S%H776><s%> shall hear <S%H6030><s%> the corn <S%H1715><s%>, and the wine <S%H8492><s%>, and the oil <S%H3323><s%>; and they shall hear <S%H6030><s%> Jezreel <S%H3157><s%>.

And I will sow <S%H2232><s%> her unto me in the earth <S%H776><s%>; and I will have mercy <S%H7355><s%> upon her that had not obtained mercy <S%H7355><s%> <S%H3818><s%>; and I will say <S%H559><s%> to them which were not my people <S%H5971><s%>, Thou art my people <S%H5971><s%>; and they shall say <S%H559><s%>, Thou art my God <S%H430><s%>.
